New Records: Australia chased 209 was their second highest successful run-chase in T20 international and It is their highest chase against India in T20Is
India's 208 was their highest score against Australia in T20 international
Hardik Pandya hammered a 25-ball his fastest fifty for India in T20 international and the joint second fastest fifty by an Indian batsman against Australia in T20Is
Cameron Green and Steve Smith set up the record second-wicket partnership for Australia against India in T20 international
Cameron Green hammered a 26-ball second fastest fifty by an Australian batsman against India in T20Is
India's 13-sixes was their joint fourth most sixes in an innings in T20 international and their joint most sixes in an innings against Australia in T20Is
Key Match Events: Nathan Ellis picked up 3-wickets for 30-runs in 4-overs
Josh Hazlewood took 2-wickets and one for Cameron Green
Axar Patel picked up 3-wickets for 17-runs in 4-overs
Umesh Yadav took 2-wickets and one for Yuzvendra Chahal
Matthew Wade blasted a unbeaten 45 off 21-balls including 6-fours & 2-sixes with strike rate of 214.28
Steve Smith struck 35 off 24-balls included 3-fours & a six with strike rate of 145.83
Aaron Finch hit 22 off 13-balls including 3-fours & a six with strike rate of 169.23
Cameron Green named Player of the match for his match-winning career-best blazing 61-runs knocked off facing 30-balls including 8-fours & 4-sixes with strike rate of 203.33
Post-Match Reflections: Cameron Green used the sweep to counter India's spinners
Miscellaneous Highlights: KL Rahul and Suryakumar Yadav set up the third highest third-wicket partnership for India against Australia in T20 Internationals
70 : Cameron Green and Steve Smith set up the record second-wicket partnership for Australia against India in T20 international
Cameron Green hammered a 26-ball second fastest fifty by an Australian batsman against India in T20Is after Matthew Wade's 25-ball half-century at Sydney in 2020
India scored 208-7 in 20 overs with top scorer by Hardik Pandya hammered a unbeaten 71 off 30-balls including 7-fours & 5-sixes with strike rate of 236.66
KL Rahul blasted a 54 off 35-balls including 4-fours & 3-sixes with strike rate of 157.14
Suryakumar Yadav hammered a 46 off 25-balls included 4-sixes & 2-fours with strike rate of 184
